encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Requested changes made, except where readings of other people are reported in the commentary of P.Oxy. 42.3011. There, the 'ed' tags were retained.
Finalized - Requested changes made, except where readings of other people are reported in the commentary of P.Oxy. 42.3011. There, the 'ed' tags were retained.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: regularize the reading τημ in l.2; remove publication details for Rea from |ed| tag in l.2; and for |ed| tag in l.3; place number tag in l.6 correctly; provide breathing on οὖν in l.9; print the restoration ἐλθὼν for ll.12-13 and remove |ed| tag (we can add the editor’s comment that πάντα will therefore be adverbial); correct the regularized form in l.18 for Ἶσιν; in l.21 print Ὄ[σιρι]ν̣ and remove |ed| tag. META: remove volume number from biblio 8353 and update deprecated ‘numbers’ field; add biblio 13223 #37; add biblio 67704 page 3385; update online image link (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH76fa.dir/POxy.v0042.n3011.a.01.hires.jpg); MP3 is 2619.2; move description from display name to legacy display name; add Pleiades georef link (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983) and correct spelling of Oxyrhynchos

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: regularize the reading τημ in l.2; remove publication details for Rea from |ed| tag in l.2; and for |ed| tag in l.3; place number tag in l.6 correctly; provide breathing on οὖν in l.9; print the restoration ἐλθὼν for ll.12-13 and remove |ed| tag (we can add the editor’s comment that πάντα will therefore be adverbial); correct the regularized form in l.18 for Ἶσιν; in l.21 print Ὄ[σιρι]ν̣ and remove |ed| tag. META: remove volume number from biblio 8353 and update deprecated ‘numbers’ field; add biblio 13223 #37; add biblio 67704 page 3385; update online image link (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH76fa.dir/POxy.v0042.n3011.a.01.hires.jpg); MP3 is 2619.2; move description from display name to legacy display name; add Pleiades georef link (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983) and correct spelling of Oxyrhynchos
